title: Leaves from the journal of our life in the Highlands, from 1848 to 1861.
author: Victoria
snippet: We also saw Dundas Castle, belonging to Dundas of Dundas, and further on, beyond Hopetoun,  Blackness Castle, famous in history.

title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: My own courage was not tried, for being at some distance  escorting the beautiful and lively Countess of Hopetoun, I did not hear of the accident till it was over.
